casebody.data:
Martha M. MENZEL, et al., Appellants, and Barbara G. Racine, et al., Plaintiffs, v. COUNTY UTILITIES CORPORATION, Appellee. No. 82-1677. United States Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit. Sept. 28, 1983.

Entered at the direction of Circuit Judge PHILLIPS with the concurrence of Circuit Judge HALL and Senior Circuit Judge BUTZNER.
